attributes.action: Our community want the council to put our people first especially the homeless
attributes.additional_details: Read the telegraph watch the news . It's taken for a poor homeless man to be murdered for the council to acknowledge that help is needed in our community
attributes.background: Everyone has seen the way the homeless live and something needs to be done . Everyone complains including the council but they don't seem interested in doing anything about the situation . So i want the council to donate some properties so i can help the homeless . Please sign the petition

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
